Manx: Cha vel y dooinney shen dy reajagh lhiasit ayns e ymmyrkey, chamoo vel fooast yn chyndaa chair er ny yientyn ayns e chree, nagh vel freayll arrey chinjagh er hene dagh laa, as oor, as minnid jeh e vea.
English: The man who does not keep constant watch on himself every day, hour, and minute of his life is not correctly repentant in his behaviour, and neither has the proper reformation been concieved in his heart.
